name: EPSSaveOptions
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when saving a document as an Illustrator EPS file.

property.name: compatibility
property.shortdesc: What Illustrator file format version to create.

property.name: embedLinkedFiles
property.shortdesc: Are linked image files to be included in the saved document.

property.name: includeDocumentThumbnails
property.shortdesc: Include thumbnail image of the EPS artwork.

property.name: embedAllFonts
property.shortdesc: Embed all fonts used by the document in the saved file (version 7 or later)

property.name: postScript
property.shortdesc: PostScript level to use (level 1 valid for file format version 8 or older)

property.name: flattenOutput
property.shortdesc: How should transparency be flattened for older file format versions (pre-version 9)

property.name: compatibleGradientPrinting
property.shortdesc: Create a raster item of the gradient or gradient mesh so that PostScript Level 2 printers can print the object.

property.name: saveMultipleArtboards
property.shortdesc: All the artboards or range of the artboards will be saved.

property.name: artboardRange
property.shortdesc: If SaveMultipleArtboards is true,this will be considered for multi-asset extraction which specifies artboard range.Empty string will extracts all the artboards.Default is empty string.
